description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Chicken Adobo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Low saturated fat,High protein,Winter,Slow cooker,Low sugar,Chicken,Father's Day
name: Slow-Cooked Chicken Adobo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 chicken thighs, on bone, with skin

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken in a glass or ceramic dish. Process half the onion and half the garlic in a food processor until it forms a paste. Combine with vinegar, soy sauce and fish sauce. Pour over chicken, then add peppercorns and bay leaves. Turn chicken to completely coat. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
Transfer chicken and marinade to a slow cooker. Slice remaining onion and garlic. Add to slow cooker. Set to high and cook for 1 hour.
Transfer chicken, skin-side up, to a baking dish lined with baking paper. Preheat grill to high.
Skim excess fat from surface of sauce. Strain sauce into a saucepan. Boil rapidly for 15 minutes or until sauce is reduced and thickened.
Grill chicken until crisp. Serve with sauce and garnished with chilli.
